parts.text: {"word":"reservarse","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(再帰動詞) 予約する、確保する、取っておく、控える","english_definition":"(reflexive verb) to reserve, to keep, to set aside, to hold back","examples":[{"sentence":"Me reservé un asiento en primera fila.","translation":"私は最前列の席を予約した。"},{"sentence":"Se reservó el derecho de opinar más tarde.","translation":"彼は後で意見を述べる権利を留保した。"},{"sentence":"Nos reservamos una botella de vino para la cena.","translation":"私たちは夕食のためにワインを1本取っておいた。"}],"collocations":["reservarse el derecho a (～する権利を留保する)","reservarse un asiento (席を予約する)","reservarse para uno mismo (自分だけのものにする、秘密にしておく)"],"synonyms":["guardar","apartar","retener","mantener","abstenerse"],"antonyms":["ceder","dar","revelar","descubrir"],"conjugation":{"present":["me reservo","te reservas","se reserva","nos reservamos","os reserváis","se reservan"],"preterite":["me reservé","te reservaste","se reservó","nos reservamos","os reservasteis","se reservaron"],"imperfect":["me reservaba","te reservabas","se reservaba","nos reservábamos","os reservabais","se reservaban"],"future":["me reservaré","te reservarás","se reservará","nos reservaremos","os reservaréis","se reservarán"],"conditional":["me reservaría","te reservarías","se reservaría","nos reservaríamos","os reservaríais","se reservarían"],"subjunctive_present":["me reserve","te reserves","se reserve","nos reservemos","os reservéis","se reserven"],"subjunctive_imperfect":["me reservara/reservase","te reservaras/reservases","se reservara/reservase","nos reserváramos/reservásemos","os reservarais/reservaseis","se reservaran/reservasen"],"imperative":["(tú) resérvate","(vosotros) reservaos"]}],"etymology":{"value":"「reservar」に再帰代名詞が付いた形。","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/re.seɾˈβaɾ.se/","syllables":"re-ser-var-se"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「Reservarse」は、自分自身のために何かを確保したり、権利や意見を留保したりする際に使われる再帰動詞です。物理的な物を取っておく場合にも、抽象的な概念を保持する場合にも使用できます。","priority":"★★☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Yo reservo. (意図: 私は自分自身のために予約する)","correct":"Yo me reservo. (私は自分自身のために予約する)","note":"再帰動詞なので、再帰代名詞を伴う必要があります。"},{"incorrect":"Reservar a ti.","correct":"Reservarte.","note":"再帰代名詞は動詞の前に置くか、不定詞に接続します。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["reserva (名詞: 予約、保留、蓄え)","reservado (形容詞: 予約済みの、控えめな)"],"related_verbs":["reservar (他動詞: 予約する、確保する)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_spanish_corpus":"中頻度","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「Reservarse」は、自分自身のために何かを確保したり、権利や意見を留保したりする際に使われる再帰動詞です。再帰代名詞を伴う必要がある点に注意してください。","priority":"★★☆"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Se reservaron las entradas con anticipación.","translation":"彼らは事前にチケットを予約した。","type":"example","meaning_category":"予約する"},{"sentence":"Me reservo mi opinión hasta que tenga más información.","translation":"より多くの情報が得られるまで、私は意見を保留します。","type":"example","meaning_category":"控える"},{"sentence":"Nos reservamos el derecho de admisión.","translation":"入場をお断りする権利を留保します。","type":"example","meaning_category":"留保する"}]}
